head: Welcome back
enterEmail: Enter the email address associated with your account and we`ll send you a link to reset your password.
weSentEmail: We`ve sent you an email with a password reset link to:
emailArrive: . If the email didn't arrive, give it a few minutes and check back. If it isn`t still there, check your spam folder.
resetPasswordDesc: Your new password must be different from previous used passwords.
sucsessReset: Your password has been successfully updated!
